name: betwizz-flutter-web
description: Betwizz Flutter Web Application - Sports Betting Intelligence Platform

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && flutter build web --release --web-renderer html --base-href / --dart-define=FLUTTER_WEB_USE_SKIA=false && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && flutter build web --release --web-renderer html --base-href / --dart-define=FLUTTER_WEB_USE_SKIA=false --dart-define=FLUTTER_WEB_AUTO_DETECT=false --source-maps && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:dev: npm run prebuild && flutter build web --debug --web-renderer html --base-href / --source-maps
scripts.build:profile: npm run prebuild && flutter build web --profile --web-renderer html --base-href / --source-maps
scripts.prebuild: npm run setup && npm run clean
scripts.postbuild: npm run optimize:assets && npm run generate:sitemap && npm run verify:build
scripts.clean: flutter clean && rm -rf build/ && rm -rf .dart_tool/ && rm -rf node_modules/.cache

author: Betwizz Team
